nodes.text: The Heavenly Sphere, briefly known as the Righteous during Queen Fanry's ownership, was the flagship of the royal fleet of Pijal. After Fanry's revolution during her coronation, she commanded the starship in an attempted assault on the Czerka Corporation vessel Leverage.
The Heavenly Sphere appears in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
